episodes.title: Tim Ballard PANICS; Mormons COMPLETELY DONE With CON MAN
episodes.description:
Tim Ballard unveils his grand unified theory of persecution, and it is a ride. He claims the church is “infiltrated,” insists infiltration proves truth, and reframes public denouncements as a coordinated takedown. Carah and Ryan unpack how he splits “true church” from “corporate church,” uses garments and testimony as optics, and backfills prophecy to cast himself as a chosen servant.

Original interview on Last Dispensation: https://youtu.be/knWZW93jvjk?si=wWCw3jwv5MCyDsSk 
Julie Green Rant: https://youtu.be/9yTBLjtbwbA?si=-YVGvfEf1wAzEotv

🤝  Donorbox: https://donorbox.org/thanks-for-the-amazing-content-carah-let-me-help-you-keep-it-funded

28:12 Tease more contradictions ahead
